/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image presents a tranquil scene of a tree-lined street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. The trees, standing tall on both sides of the street, form a natural canopy, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding to the serene ambiance of the scene.

The street itself is paved with asphalt, its surface gleaming under the sunlight. On the right side of the street, there's a dirt path, inviting passersby to take a leisurely stroll. The perspective of the image is from the middle of the street, looking down its length, giving a sense of depth and continuity to the scene.

The colors in the image are vibrant and natural. The green of the trees contrasts beautifully with the blue of the sky, while the gray of the asphalt and dirt path adds a touch of urbanity to the scene. The overall effect is a harmonious blend of nature and urban life, captured in a single, peaceful moment.
